item.title: Minto Pyramid principle
item.description: User: What is Minto pyramid principle for thinking and writing Assistant: The Minto Pyramid Principle, developed by Barbara Minto, is a structured approach for organizing information in writing and thinking. It is especially useful for creating clear and compelling reports, presentations, and documents. The principle is based on the idea that ideas should form a pyramid, with the main idea at the top and supporting arguments and details underneath.
